Question: Everdisplay Optronics (Shanghai) Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Everdisplay Optronics (Shanghai) Co., Ltd.

Product 1: AMOLED Display Panels

 - Dedicated to mass production of small-to-medium AMOLED displays
 - Invested 7.05 billion RMB for the first G4.5 LTPS AMOLED production line in China
 - Engaged in R&D, production, and sales of AMOLED semiconductor display panels
 - Offers high-resolution small and medium-sized AMOLED panels for both Chinese and international markets
